Pre-Game Insights: Jackson Chourio, coming off a four-RBI performance in his last game, will take the field for the Milwaukee Brewers versus Steven Matz and the St. Louis Cardinals on Tuesday.
Chourio enters this game on a seven-game hitting streak.
Chourio is batting .278 with 22 doubles, two triples, 18 home runs and 31 walks.
In MLB play, Chourio ranks 74th in homers and 47th in RBI.
Steven Matz (1-2) takes the hill for the Cardinals in his seventh start of the season. He has produced a 6.18 ERA in 27 2/3 innings pitched, with 17 Ks.
